name: BIRDWORLD
description:
Play as a little yellow bird. Shoot bats with your projectile spit. Eat lots of little bugs. Die eventually. It's all good in BIRDWORLD, the most realistic bird simulator this side of Haotful Boyfriend! 

Press Enter to start and tap up repeatedly to fly. Move around with the arrow keys. Use down to drop faster and catch those little flies in your beak.  Watch out for bats. You can shoot them by pressing the space bar, but doing so will deplete your tummy. Make sure you eat lots of bugs to stay big and strong. 

Note that this game does feature some flashing lights, so those with epilepsy and light sensitivity should take caution.
